Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What the... You've made over 10,000,000G
worth of sales?!
<PAGE>
How many sales is that? I can't even calculate
that high!

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've made over 1,000,000G worth of
sales! That's amazing!!

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've made over 100,000G worth of sales. Glad
to hear your business is running so smoothly!

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lucky me! I found exactly what I wanted and
bought it right away. ♪

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd rather have buyer's remorse than miss getting
what I want. So whenever I'm not sure, I just go
ahead and buy it.

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I couldn't buy this last time I saw it. Glad I could
get it this time!

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrm, I couldn't find what I wanted...

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess this town doesn't have a very good
selection, does it?

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I didn't bring enough money this time. I'll
save it for next time.

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, what should I buy today?

<NAME_MOB_FLORENTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My parents are running a farm.
